items.title: Reijnders moet lachen om beeldvorming bij Oranje: 'Discussie weer voorbij'
items.summary: Tijjani Reijnders kijkt uit naar het WK van komende zomer met het Nederlands elftal. Vijftien jaar geleden zat hij als elfjarige jongen voor de tv toen Oranje de finale haalde met Zuid-Afrika. Dat hij Nederland nu zelf mag vertegenwoordigen op het hoogste podium, vindt de 27-jarige middenvelder van Manchester City erg bijzonder.

items.title: Today on Sky Sports Racing: Lingfield hosts seven-race jumps card
items.summary: All eyes are on Lingfield Park today, with a seven-race National Hunt card scheduled - live on Sky Sports Racing.

items.title: 'I didn't get that right' - McCullum admits error on England Ashes preparation
items.summary: Brendon McCullum has accepted responsibility for not getting England's Ashes preparation right after his side succumbed to a series defeat to Australia by losing the third Test.

items.title: 'Luke is a different breed' - NHS worker Davies looking to upset Littler
items.summary: David Davies says Luke Littler is a ‚Äúdifferent breed‚Äù but is hoping to cause a major upset when the pair meet in the second round of the World Darts Championship on Sunday night.

items.title: 'Emotional' Stokes laments end of Ashes dream | 'It hurts'
items.summary: Ben Stokes said the death of his England side's Ashes dream "hurts" and "sucks" as Australia clinched a series win inside 11 days with an 82-run victory on the final day of the third Test in Adelaide.

items.title: Toen Van Gaal zijn bewondering uitsprak voor teamspeler Beckham
items.summary: Voetbal International viert dit jaar zijn zestigjarig jubileum. Naar aanleiding daarvan herplaatsen we elke dag in het weekeinde een verhaal uit ons rijke archief. Deze keer gaan we terug naar eind 2000, toen we Louis van Gaal uitnodigden op de redactie.

items.title: Australia beat England to go 3-0 up and retain Ashes
items.summary: England's dismal Ashes series defeat was confirmed as Australia sealed a 82-run victory on the final day of the third Test in Adelaide.

items.title: Mbapp√© equals Ronaldo record, hits 'Siu' celeb
items.summary: Kylian Mbapp√© added his name to another line in the record books on Saturday, tying Cristiano Ronaldo for the most goals by a Real Madrid player in a calendar year.

items.title: Arteta: Arsenal unfazed by Man City title charge
items.summary: Mikel Arteta said Arsenal were not distracted by Manchester City moving top of the Premier League before the Gunners reclaimed number one spot hours later with a 1-0 win at Everton.

items.title: 'I'm not a clown': Sevilla boss blasts red-card ref
items.summary: Sevilla coach Matias Almeyda blasted referee Alejandro Mu√±iz after being shown a half-time red card during the team's 2-0 LaLiga defeat at Real Madrid, saying "I'm not a clown in a circus."

items.title: Isak injured while scoring in Liverpool win at Spurs
items.summary: Liverpool forward Alexander Isak could be facing a lengthy spell on the sidelines after suffering an injury in his team's Premier League clash with Tottenham Hotspur.

items.title: Calvert-Lewin scores twice as Leeds thrash Crystal Palace
items.summary: Dominic Calvert-Lewin extends his scoring streak to five Premier League games with a superb double as Leeds United secure a comfortable victory over Crystal Palace at Elland Road.

items.title: Gyokores penalty sends Arsenal top of the table in win against Everton
items.summary: Arsenal striker Viktor Gyokores' first-half penalty sends the Gunners to the top of the Premier League table in win over Everton.

items.title: European football: Mbapp√© matches Ronaldo‚Äôs record as Real close on Bar√ßa
items.summary: Mbapp√© makes it 59 goals in a year in win over Sevilla Juventus stay in Serie A race with 2-1 win over Roma Kylian Mbapp√© equalled Cristiano Ronaldo‚Äôs record of 59 goals in a calendar year for Real Madrid with a late penalty in his side‚Äôs 2-0 home win over Sevilla in La Liga on Saturday, the French forward celebrating his 27th birthday in style. Mbapp√© missed several earlier chances before getting his chance from the spot four minutes from time and he made no mistake to net his 59th goal in as many games across all competitions in 2025 to level Ronaldo‚Äôs 2013 haul. Continue reading...

items.title: Grim is kritisch na gelijkspel Ajax: 'Dat moet echt beter'
items.summary: Ajax gaat met een derde plaats de winterstop in. Trainer Fred Grim weet precies wat er na de onderbreking beter moet bij zijn ploeg.

items.title: Trotse Telstar-trainer Correia: 'Waar we nu staan, is meer dan verdiend'
items.summary: Telstar-trainer Anthony Correia is bijzonder trots op hoe zijn ploeg zich in de eerste seizoenshelft heeft gepresenteerd. Dankzij de overwinning op NAC Breda staat de nieuwkomer in de Eredivisie halverwege deze jaargang op de vijftiende plaats.

items.title: Grafstemming bij hekkensluiter NAC: 'We raakten het helemaal kwijt'
items.summary: NAC Breda wist dat het zaterdagavond onder geen beding mocht verliezen van Telstar, maar de Brabanders lieten dat wel gebeuren. Dat liet nogal zijn sporen na in het Rat Verlegh Stadion, bleek uit de reacties van geel-zwarte zijde.

items.title: Manchester United could switch to a back four now, admits Ruben Amorim
items.summary: United manager may change favoured 3-4-3 formation Wing-backs Diallo and Mazraoui at African Cup of Nations Ruben Amorim has admitted for the first time that Manchester United could play with a back four at some point instead of the 3-4-3 formation he has fielded for all his 59 matches as the head coach. In Monday‚Äôs 4-4 draw with Bournemouth at Old Trafford Amorim again deployed the shape, with his wing-backs making a five-man rearguard when defending. While this became a four when attacking, as Amad Diallo pushed into midfield from right-back, Amorim has faced scrutiny for lacking the flexibility to change formation. Continue reading...

items.title: Haaland scores twice as Man City beat West Ham
items.summary: Erling Haaland scores twice to help Manchester City beat beleaguered West Ham United for a fifth straight Premier League victory which moved them top of the table.

items.title: Liverpool hold on to beat nine-man Spurs
items.summary: Substitute Alexander Isak scores for Liverpool before being forced off with injury as Arne Slot's side win a chaotic Premier League match at nine-man Tottenham.
